description:
We are a vitamin and supplement manufacturer and we are seeking a warehouse associate to support the shipping department with order fulfillment.

Primary Responsibilities:

  • Preparing and printing shipping labels
  • Responding to client order emails
  • Using inventory system to track items
  • Preparing samples and mailing to prospective customers
  • Clerical support for Plant Manager
  • Use RF Scanner
  • other warehouse duties as required

Requirements:

  • 2 years warehouse experience
  • Shipping and receiving experience
  • able to carry 50lbs

M - F 8 am - 5pm
responsibilities: Preparing and printing shipping labels, Responding to client order emails, Using inventory system to track items, Preparing samples and mailing to prospective customers, Clerical support for Plant Manager, Use RF Scanner, other warehouse duties as required

qualifications.required: 2 years warehouse experience, Shipping and receiving experience, able to carry 50lbs
